title: Personal Pronouns
content:
# Personal Pronouns in Spanish

## Subject Pronouns
- yo - I
- tú - you (informal)
- él/ella/usted - he/she/you (formal)
- nosotros/nosotras - we
- vosotros/vosotras - you all (informal, Spain)
- ellos/ellas/ustedes - they/you all (formal)

## Practice Exercises
1. Identify the correct pronoun in sentences
2. Replace names with pronouns
3. Practice formal vs informal usage

title: Describing Yourself
content:
# Personal Description in Spanish

## Key Vocabulary
- Me llamo... - My name is...
- Tengo ... años - I am ... years old
- Soy de... - I am from...
- Vivo en... - I live in...
- Mi trabajo es... - My job is...

## Practice Exercises
1. Introduce yourself in Spanish
2. Ask others for their personal information
3. Write a short personal description

title: Family Members
content:
# Family Vocabulary in Spanish

## Family Members
- padre/madre - father/mother
- hermano/hermana - brother/sister
- abuelo/abuela - grandfather/grandmother
- tío/tía - uncle/aunt
- primo/prima - cousin

## Practice Exercises
1. Describe your family members
2. Create a family tree with Spanish labels
3. Talk about family relationships
